control.name: teEditMask
control.description: This text editor allows you to specify the mask expression.

control.name: icbAutoComplete
control.description: This combo box allows you to change the automatic completion mode used by the editor in the RegEx mask mode.

control.name: cbPlaceHolder
control.description: This combo box allows you to change the character used as the placeholder in a masked editor for the Simple, Regular and RegEx mask types..

control.name: ceBeepOnError
control.description: This check box controls whether an editor makes a beep sound when an end-user tries to enter an invalid character.

control.name: ceIgnoreMaskBlank
control.description: This check box controls whether an editor can lose focus when a value hasn't been entered. This affects only the Simple, Regular and RegEx mask types.

control.name: ceSaveLiteral
control.description: This check box controls whether constantly displayed mask characters (literals) are included in an editor's value. This affects only the Simple and Regular mask types. For the RegEx mask type the constantly displayed characters are always included in the editor's value.

control.name: ceShowPlaceHolder
control.description: This check box controls whether placeholders are displayed in a masked editor. This affects only the RegEx mask type. For the Regular and Simple mask types placeholders are always visible. For the Numeric and DateTime mask types placeholders are not supported.

control.name: ceUseMaskAsDisplayFormat
control.description: This check box controls whether the mask settings are used to format display values when the editor isn't focused.
